markdownRemark.html:
Let's list the two possibilities of the problem and then present the solution, okay?

  1. Email in SPAM box or Blocked by the provider

In this case, please check your SPAM box. If it's not there, it's possible that the provider has blocked the email. Resending it (done by the organizer in the app) usually solves this problem. However, in more extreme cases, we advise changing the person's email or asking them to add the email sorteio@papelzinho.com.br to their email provider's contacts to avoid blocking.

(How to RESEND the email of a participant in the app: Simply the organizer in the app, open the draw group, tap on the participant to resend. Then they just need to confirm that they want to resend! This does not cause any change in the overall draw. Everyone continues with the same secret friends.)

  1. Email was mistyped by the secret friend organizer

Check with the secret friend organizer if the email was typed correctly. To check, just enter the group and verify the email of the members who reported the problem. If there is a typing error, it can be edited and the problem resolved.

(How to EDIT and resend the email of a participant: Simply the organizer enters the app, opens the draw group, taps on the participant to edit and makes the changes. Then they just need to confirm that they want to resend! This does not cause any change in the overall draw. Everyone continues with the same secret friends.)

We hope this helps. If you continue to have problems, just contact us. We are always available!

Have a great secret friend exchange!

frontmatter.title: How to discover why a participant didn't received his email: 2 possibilities
